extends java.lang.Object
    A class for loading and saving images

      • loadImages

        public void loadImages(java.lang.String[] fileNames,
                       RGB channel)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Load the images and store them internally. The green channels can be accessed through accessor.
        Parameters:
        fileNames - Names of the images
        channel - Color channel RED = 16, GREEN = 8, BLUE = 0
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If images are not of same size
        java.io.IOException - If image couldn't be loaded

      • saveImage

        public static void saveImage(int[] pixels,
                             int width,
                             int height,
                             java.lang.String path,
                             java.lang.String fileName)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Create and image object from pixel values and save to disk
        Parameters:
        pixels - Pixels in integer format
        width - Width of the image
        height - Height of the image
        path - Path to save the image to
        fileName - Name of the output image
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • saveImage

        public static void saveImage(int[] pixels,
                             int width,
                             int height,
                             java.lang.String fileName)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Create and image object from pixel values and save to disk
        Parameters:
        pixels - Pixels in integer format
        width - Width of the image
        height - Height of the image
        fileName - Name of the output image
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If saving the image does not succeed
